item.title: How dangerous permissions sneak into apps
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: This is a post-mortem where the very dangerous permission, READ_PHONE_STATE, unintentionally sneaked into our app. Here’s how this could happen, how we debugged and finally how we solved it.
